title: Mother 3 (J) ROM + Patch English v1.0
description:
UPDATED: I've uploaded a new torrent containing the newer version of the English patch here; http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5668048/Mother_3_%28J%29_ROM___English_patch_v1.1

This is a clean version of Mother 3 (J) ROM which includes the recent released English patch! (v1.0)


NOTE: You have to patch it yourself. Another thing, the reason an emulator isn't added is because I figured people may have one or it's an emulator they don't want. If you need one, I suggest VBA-M as its good but you may need to play with the sound.

Mac users, if you use VBA-M you'll need to play with SRAM because it seems to have a saving problem. Nevertheless, have fun.
